tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robo_advisor_market_data (
    market_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    open_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    close_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    high_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    low_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE HistoricalMarketData (
    market_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    market_name VARCHAR,
    market_date DATE,
    market_open FLOAT,
    market_close FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MarketData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  date DATE,
  open NUMERIC(10, 2),
  high NUMERIC(10, 2),
  low NUMERIC(10, 2),
  close NUMERIC(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketForecast (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  forecast_date DATE,
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  forecast_value NUMERIC(10, 2),
  confidence_level NUMERIC(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketData (
	symbol VARCHAR(255),
	date DATE,
	open_price DECIMAL,
	close_price DECIMAL,
	high_price DECIMAL,
	low_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Trends (
	id SERIAL,
	symbol VARCHAR(255),
	trend_type VARCHAR(50),
	trend_value DECIMAL,
	trend_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AdvisorClients (
	client_id SERIAL,
	advisor_id SERIAL,
	client_name VARCHAR(255),
	client_age INT,
	client_investment DECIMAL
);
